text: Wilhelmina Hendrika "Mien" Schopman-Klaver (26 February 1911 in Amsterdam – 10 July 2018 in Leiden, Netherlands) was a Dutch athlete. She was a reserve for the 4 × 100 metres relay at the 1932 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles. Schopman- Klaver became a centenarian in 2011 and celebrated her 106th birthday in 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * 'Wat!? Ik naar de Olympische Spelen? Enig!' title: Mien Schopman-Klaver
